message: This is a high-quality product, worth $3000000 to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
I accept your offer, I'll take the product

I'm glad you liked the first product! Unfortunately, this one is a different story. I'm not at liberty to disclose its quality, but I can offer you a 50/50 chance of it being worth $3000000. If you're feeling lucky, I'll sell it to you for $1000000. But if you're not feeling confident, I can offer you a 'free' inspection, and you can decide after you see the product.
I'd like to take the free inspection option, please.

No hard feelings about the last one! Let me make it up to you. I'll give you a special deal on this high-quality product. I'll sell it to you for $900000, which is a $100000 discount from the standard price. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
I'm not interested in buying at $900000, I'll pass.

I understand you're being cautious, but I assure you, this product is a gem. I'll give you a chance to prove it to yourself. I'll sell it to you for $950000, and if it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a full refund of $950000. You have nothing to lose, and everything to gain.
I'll take the product at $950000, with the refund guarantee.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last one! Now, let's talk about this new product. I'll make you a deal that's even better than the last one. I'll sell it to you for $980000, and I'll throw in a 10% discount on your next purchase if you buy this one. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a deal like this anywhere else.
I'll take the product at $980000, and I'll take you up on the 10% discount offer for my next purchase.

I'm glad you're enjoying the discounts! Now, let's make it even sweeter. I'll sell you this high-quality product for $1000000, but I'll give you an additional 15% discount on your next purchase, on top of the 10% discount you already have. It's a deal you won't want to pass up!
I'll take the product at $1000000, and I'll take you up on the additional 15% discount offer for my next purchase.

I'll give you a special 'no-questions-asked' return policy on this one. If you buy it and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll take it back and give you a full refund. No hassle, no fuss. What do you say?
I'll take the product, with the no-questions-asked return policy.

I'll take the product, with the 100% refund guarantee.
